dict.string: Say “No thanks” to %@ pictures %@ by pushing them away from you.
Say “Yes please” to %@ pictures %@ by pulling them towards you.

You will have 60 seconds to see how many pictures you can sort – there will be a timer on the screen.
Quick is good but remember, the quicker you go, the more errors you might make. You get a point for every one you get right but lose two if you get it wrong.
